title: Rain-X Visor Rain Repellent
features: Water beads and flies off at 40+ km/h
Safe for all visor materials and coatings
description: Rain-X Visor Rain Repellent creates an invisible hydrophobic barrier on your helmet visor. Water beads up and flies off at speed, dramatically improving visibility during wet rides. One application lasts 4-6 weeks. Safe on all visor materials including Pinlock inserts and photochromic shields.
